description: Demo script to create a graph dataset to show names of individuals and groups, potentially useful for acknowledgements in a talk.

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Required input text file with format for each line: first last groupname.

center_flag.title: Center flag
center_flag.description: Put center coord at x,y,z=0,0,0. Otherwise, uses average xyz in surface.

subsurface_file.title: Subsurface file
subsurface_file.description: Surface for surrounding members of group (use ld2, ld4, ld5, ld6, .... default is ld5).

scale_factor.title: Scale factor
scale_factor.description: Scale xyz for group nodes (default is 1.0).

reduce_factor.title: Reduce factor
reduce_factor.description: Scale xyz offsets for member nodes (xyz/r), default is 10.
